title: You are no son of mine.

replies.body: kids smiling in last panel tho
He is a Vayne main and enjoying the freelo too much to worry about such things
Vayne main at home in the garbage?
It's because he finally fits in

On the one hand, this is very funny.

On the other hand, infant abandonment jokes are far too dark for me to upvote.
Ill upvote just because you triggered someone
